Detailed Description

ISMA key management system atom.

Contained in scheme information atom. It must contain key management system URI.

Definition at line 412 of file IMPEG4DRMAtom.h.

virtual const char* DRMPlugin::MPEG4SinfDRMPlugin::IMP4IKMSAtom::GetKeyManagementSystemURI (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Get key management system URI (null terminated string). Must be != 0.

Returns:
key management system URI, if contains one.

0, if does not contain key management system URI (error).

virtual bool DRMPlugin::MPEG4SinfDRMPlugin::IMP4IKMSAtom::SetKeyManagementSystemURI (  const char *  uri  )  [pure virtual]
 

Set key management system URI (null terminated string).

If key management system URI already exists, it must be removed and replaced by newly created one. Data representing key management system URI must be locally copied.

Returns:
Boolean indicating success or not.
